name: Calsoft labs
tag_list: consumer-electronics, networking, wireless, embedded, resourcing, automotive
overview:
“We at Calsoft Labs offer product engineering services including software as well as hardware design/testing services to global technology companies. With CMMi Level 3 delivery centers worldwide including offshore development centers in US, Calsoft has helped leading technology companies such as HP, Cisco, IXIA, Samsung, Motorola, EMC, Nortel, Adobe, Radware, etc to develop and maintain various technology products. Calsoft labs has 15 years of experience in delivering product engineering services and has proved to be an ideal partner for technology companies in augmenting their engineering teams.

Key Strengths:

  1. Over 1200 people
  2. $60 Mil in revenue
  3. SEI-CMM Level 3 certified
  4. Proven Experience in running large scale ODC, Projects as well as onsite Consulting.
  5. Proven Experience in Networking and related Open-Source Technologies

You may find that we have very strong networking domain expertise covering various types L2, L3 Optical/Security/Wireless networking/telecom products covering variety of RTOS/Linux platforms & embedded/BSP level software development & QA.

Relevant Technology Expertise:

ü NGDC, Networking & Security: Switching/Routing, L2/L3, Firewall, IDS/IPS, UTM, IPSEC&SSL VPN, PKI, AAA Diameter/Radius, Emerging IP Multimedia Systems, VOIP/IPTV,VOD Technologies, Data Storage Technologies.

ü Network Management systems: EMS, NMS, OAMP, FCAPS, SNMP

ü Test strategy, planning, test case design, functional & regression testing, automation framework creation, test case automation, performance testing, and security testing.

Assuring the best services.
